alert.note: Alert for Broadwater; Gallatin; Madison; Meagher (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 12:40PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Broadwater, southeastern Meagher, southwestern Judith Basin, east central Madison and northeastern Gallatin Counties through 115 PM MDT... At 1239 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 23 miles northwest of Clyde Park to 13 miles east of Ennis. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bozeman, White Sulphur Springs, Belgrade, Bozeman Hot Springs, Ringling, Martinsdale, Gallatin Gateway, Four Corners, Amsterdam, Lennep, Church Hill, Menard and Checkerboard. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between mile markers 291 and 321. Highway 12 between mile markers 27 and 77. Highway 191 between mile markers 51 and 87. Highway 89 between mile markers 1 and 5, and between mile markers 38 and 57. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM MDT for central Montana.
